dcterms:description: A moving 3DT cardiac/lung phantom was simulated and reconstructed, incorporating dynamic motion and activity levels based on realistic 13N-ammonia values.
dcterms:title: Cardiac/lung phantom

dcterms:creator: D. L. Collins
A. P. Zijdenbos
V. Kollokian
J. G. Sled
N. J. Kabani
C. J. Holmes
A. C. Evans
dcterms:description: A 256 Ã— 256 BrainWeb brain phantom with three inserted lesions was used as input to the dPETSTEP simulation, with realistic kinetic parameters assigned according to the 2-tissue kinetic model for 18F-fluorothymidine.
dcterms:title: BrainWeb brain phantom

dcterms:description: The Cancer Imaging Archive provides a collection of medical images for cancer research, including a stationary anthropomorphic lung phantom scan used in the cardiac/lung phantom simulation.
dcterms:title: Cancer Imaging Archive
